name: Signals - Green Glitched MIDI Fractal
description:
Signals are a collection of creative projects designed to push the blockchain signals collection further through live editing or other techniques using OsciStudio Livecoding which creates an audio file that can be interpreted as an x,y signal and played through an oscilloscope emulator. The result is visually depicted while listening to the audio signal source to juxtapose the digitization of the human experience and consider the abstraction of data into art.

Fractals were glitched and color modified with a MIDI soundtrack designed to modulate the audio signal generating the visuals.
